comments: A local cache of this file is used by gm4.co to display modules and module information
It lists modules with details per version and can be modified to create a change on the
Modules have global descriptions and links but these can be overwritten per version if needed.
early_versions set to true means there are pre 1.13 versions of the module and the page will
link to the old module page based on the module id.

modules.name: Bat Grenades
modules.description: Tired of the uselessness of bats? This module will turn them into tiny furry flying balls of boom!

modules.name: Enderman Support Class
modules.description: This module allows Endermen to aid nearby hostiles in their fight against the player!
